channel.title: quicksort on Bikulov Octonotes
channel.description: Recent content in quicksort on Bikulov Octonotes

item.title: Randomized quicksort implementation in C++
item.description: Quicksort has $O(N\log(N))$ computational complexity in best and average cases, $O(N^{2})$ for bad case. Extremely bad cases may be avoided by using randomized Quicksort.
